# Starter Templates

Basic templates to get you started. These are intentionally simpleâ€”copy them, improve them, make them your own.

## How to Use

1. Copy the template content
2. Ask Claude to use it with your game data
3. Iterate and improve based on what works

## Available Templates

| Template | Purpose |
|----------|---------|
| [scouting-report.md](./scouting-report.md) | Structured intel analysis for a zone or route |
| [route-risk-model.md](./route-risk-model.md) | Evaluate shipping route safety |
| [production-calculator.md](./production-calculator.md) | Plan resource conversion chains |
| [supply-chain-planner.md](./supply-chain-planner.md) | End-to-end logistics planning |

## Contributing

Built something better? The community benefits from shared tools.

- **Operator/Command tiers**: Publish directly to the template marketplace
- **Everyone**: Submit a PR to this repo with your template

Good templates are:
- **Focused** - Do one thing well
- **Documented** - Explain what it does and how to use it
- **Improvable** - Leave room for customization
